alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Ashe; Wilkes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Alleghany, northwestern Wilkes, and Ashe Counties in northwestern North Carolina through 345 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jefferson... West Jefferson... Lansing... Laurel Springs... Glendale Springs... Wilbar... and Mc Grady. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for northwestern North Carolina...and southwestern Virginia. Additional statements will be issued as conditions warrant.
